about_the_game:
The laughter of the mysterious man you played poker with was like a handful of nails thrown under your bare feet. Hearing him, you knew you had gotten yourself into trouble. You had lost everything. The man's name was Mr. Locke, and for some reason he didn't just want to rip you off, he had other plans for you.

Prepare drinks and dishes, serve them to customers, and discover their stories

Immerse yourself in a realistic world full of gossip and information influencing gameplay. Shape customers behavior, indulge in specially crafted mechanics and enjoy yourself while making drinks.

Enhance your saloon by choosing from hundreds of decoration models

An extensive customization system influences the environment and storyline, allowing you to create a unique experience. Don't hesitate to create a place that expresses your wildest decorating desires and see what results it will bring.

Build relationships with residents and become a part of their lives

Uncover individual needs, motivations and hidden secrets of the plot by bonding with various characters. Get the opportunity to build your own community in a world full of fast action, strong drinks and humor as dark as gunpowder.

Maintain your saloon for customer comfort

Hire employees like musician or courtesans and invest in various ventures such as the hotel, gambling pit and bathhouse.

Dive into the mechanics of the criminal world

As a bartender, you'll encounter adversities not only within the saloon but also beyond its walls. Some of these challenges may not be entirely legal… Brace yourself for tasks like concealing a corpse, evading the sheriff, or smashing a wagon with a crowbar.

 

Core mechanics

  • Personalization of your Saloon - an extensive customization system influences the environment and storyline, allowing you to create a unique experience.

  • Serving food and drinks - influence customer behavior and indulge in specially crafted mechanics.

  • Building relationships - uncover individual needs, motivations and hidden secrets of the plot by bonding with various characters.

  • Participating in activities of the criminal world - Delve into the dark side of the Old West.

  • Managing the saloon and town - hire employees like musician or courtesans and invest in various ventures such as the hotel, gambling pit and bathhouse.

  • Exploring an elaborate system of emotions and behavior - immerse yourself in a realistic world full of gossip and information influencing gameplay, creating a dynamic and authentic experience.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Saloon simulator is a first-person simulation game where you undertake the challenge of restoring an abandoned saloon. Master drink-making and cooking, customize your establishment to influence customers. Indulge yourself in numerous other mini-games and engage in a narrative-driven Old West story.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
